divs: Sighting DetailsOn the evening of September 16, 2008, several people witnessed and recorded three "barrel" shap objects over Bogota, Colombia (a very large city in the Andes). I saw this report on RCN's English language broadcast: www.rcnnews.tv To view, you will need to check the archives. Word about this might also be found in Colombian newspapers. Colombia seems to experience heavy UFO activity and there is speculation that a landing-strip is being prepared in a rural area.
trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Bogota
There were no other sightings in Bogota on or around September 16th 2008
Summary: Sightings of three "barrels" in the Bogota sky
